DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate risk factor associate depression factor might transmit cross-generationally . The investigator conduct integrative assessment emotion regulation stress reactivity group mother without history depression daughter .
DOC.brief_title: Mothers With History Depression Their 10-14 Year Old Daughters
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate risk factor associate depression factor might transmit cross-generationally . We conduct integrative assessment emotion regulation stress reactivity group mother without history depression daughter . We use range methodology evaluate process , include self-report measure , information-processing performance , HPA-axis function reactivity , neural response emotional stimulus follow exposure stressful experience .
DOC.criteria: Eligible mother must read speak English fluently child age 9 15 year old . Mothers must either history psychopathology history depression child 's lifetime . Eligible mother : currently treatment drug alcohol abuse significant symptomatology relate psychopathology outside depression medical history neurological injury impairment . Mothers meet requirement inclusion control group must history Axis I disorder .
